list.title: HTML / CSS / JavaScript / VueJS / ReactJS / NuxtJS / NextJS
list.text: Capable of creating web pages and functionalities using front-end technologies, as well as integrating APIs. I always consider maintainability, scalability, and modular design in my programming. Most of my work involves client-side rendering (CSR), but I have also experimented with NextJS and NuxtJS to explore server-side rendering (SSR) and static site generation (SSG). Additionally, I have used Vercel to deploy projects connected with GitHub.

list.title: PHP / Laravel / NodeJS / MySQL / Mssql / Mongodb
list.text: Capable of creating APIs according to requirements and planning databases according to the architecture. I have experience in assisting companies with optimizing and refactoring legacy projects. Additionally, in my spare time, I have experimented with using NodeJS with SocketIO and MongoDB to create a simple chat room. In my work, I have used MySQL's EXPLAIN to understand SQL execution and appropriately used indexes to enhance search speed. I have also utilized partitioning and sharding to optimize databases.
